item.title: Version 1.6
item.description:
SpeechToType 1.6

New default models, local Whisper server support, and UI improvements!

New Features

  • Local Whisper Server: Use your own local Whisper-compatible server instead of the OpenAI API for transcription
  • Configurable Whisper Server: Set custom server URL, model name, and optional Bearer token

Improvements

  • New Default Transcription Model: GPT-4o Transcribe is now the default (higher quality)
  • New Default Rewrite Model: GPT-5.2 is now the default for text rewriting
  • Fixed Sidebar Layout: Settings view no longer pushes the sidebar navigation off-screen on small windows
  • Scrollable detail view for better usability at any window size

item.title: Version 1.5
item.description:
SpeechToType 1.5

Major keyboard shortcut update with fully customizable shortcuts!

New Features

  • New Default Shortcut: Right Option key (⌥ rechts) is now the default for dictation instead of Control
  • Three Separate Shortcuts: Configure different shortcuts for each function:
    • Direct Dictation (hold key) - Default: Right Option
    • Continuous Recording (double-tap) - Default: Double-tap Right Option
    • Text Rewrite (key combination) - Default: Right Option + Space
  • Full Customization: Each shortcut can be set to any key or key combination
  • Improved Settings UI: Clear descriptions for each shortcut type

Improvements

  • Better modifier key detection (supports left/right variants)
  • Migration from old shortcut settings to new format
  • Updated German and English localizations

item.title: Version 1.4
item.description:
SpeechToType 1.4

Feature update with microphone selection and improved text rewriting!

New Features

  • Processing Indicator: Visual loading spinner while transcription is being processed by the API
  • Microphone Selection: Choose your preferred microphone directly from the menu bar
  • Clipboard Rewrite: New option to rewrite text from clipboard without selecting it first
  • Rewrite History: Rewritten texts are now saved to history (can be disabled in settings)
  • History Filters: Filter history by transcriptions or rewrites

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed GPT-5 and GPT-5.2 API error with max_tokens parameter
  • Improved text selection detection for rewrite function

item.title: Version 1.3
item.description:
SpeechToType 1.3

Bugfix release with improved text rewriting!

Improvements

  • Copy Button: New copy button in text rewrite popup - easily copy the result if automatic insertion doesn't work
  • Keyboard Shortcut: Use ⌘C to quickly copy the rewritten text

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed text rewrite shortcut not triggering in some cases

item.title: Version 1.2
item.description:
SpeechToType 1.2

Feature update with improved continuous recording and statistics!

New Features

  • Improved Continuous Recording: Double-tap Control to start continuous recording, double-tap again to stop. No need to hold the key!
  • Menu Bar Actions: Start/stop continuous recording and trigger text rewrite directly from the menu bar
  • Statistics Dashboard: Track your transcription stats - words transcribed, tokens used, and estimated time saved
  • Shortcut Reset: New button to reset keyboard shortcuts to defaults

Improvements

  • Fixed keyboard shortcut recording in settings
  • Fixed crash when holding the transcription button
  • Improved thread safety for audio level updates
  • Enhanced German and English localization

item.title: Version 1.1
item.description:
SpeechToType 1.1

Major feature update with new capabilities!

New Features

  • Recording Overlay: Visual indicator with sound wave animation while recording
  • Continuous Recording: Double-tap the hotkey to record without holding
  • Text Rewriting: Select text and use AI to correct grammar, elaborate, or apply custom prompts
  • Customizable Shortcuts: Configure your own keyboard shortcuts for all functions
  • GPT Model Selection: Choose between GPT-4o, GPT-5, and GPT-5.2 for text rewriting

Improvements

  • Fixed API key input in onboarding
  • Improved settings organization
  • Enhanced localization for German and English
